Today, the North East is lighting up with solid 7 ft @ 9s N swell and fresh 16 mph WNW winds. Saltburn Point and Saltburn Beach are prime spots, especially during their best windows. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 5 ft @ 8s N with moderate 11 mph W winds, still offering fun conditions at various beaches. On the day after, expect smaller 4 ft @ 7s N with fresh 23 mph NW winds, making it less favorable. Best: today.
